rename.from: Custome methods of ErrorRenderer are called only on debug mode
rename.to: Custom methods of ErrorRenderer are called only on debug mode

body:
> Is there any reason why debug mode is checked here?

Yes, the reason is that in debug we show specific developer friendly errors - like 'Missing Controller' - while in a production mode we only show generic 40x or 50x error pages. If we called custom methods on the exception renderer all the time, we'd need to require developers to do debug checks in their custom methods as well.

Its worth noting that this is only an issue for exceptions that do not extend `Cake\Network\HttpException` as those should always have custom error handling methods invoked.

I think we don't use custom method to show developer friendly errors. Instead, we are using specific templates such as `missing_controller.ctp`. So I also think it is reasonable to disable such templates [here](https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/blob/18e5d31a8a5bd6f875790a930e3ff6d2be106f93/src/Error/ExceptionRenderer.php#L273-L280) when debug on. But I don't think it is necessary to disable custom methods [here](https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/blob/18e5d31a8a5bd6f875790a930e3ff6d2be106f93/src/Error/ExceptionRenderer.php#L161-L166). Currently, developers must override the `render()` method by copy&paste if they want some additional logic when a missing controller exception or something happens in the production mode.
Those are good points. I'm on-board with changing the behavior in a minor release (3.4.0, 3.5.0) if you want to change it.

@markstory I think splitting the two paths up is a pretty poor developer experience. If you are a new dev and only *sometimes* your code gets called, you'll come to hate the framework.

Maybe for 4.x we simply call `ExceptionRenderer::render()` and let the dev handle the rest in all cases?
@josegonzalez I agree its not great right now. I don't want to surprise people in a patch release when error handling starts working differently.

issue.title: Always call custom exception renderer method.

milestone.description: Enhancements for the next 3.x feature release.

repository.name: cakephp
